overview: Anthony Geary (General Hospital) stars as a compassionate doctor who must treat an STD outbreak at an upscale vacation resort.  Judith Light (Law & Order: Special Victims Unit) co-stars as an afflicted resident whose heart is broken by this personal tragedy.  A despicable real estate tycoon played by Robert Vaughn (The Man from U.N.C.L.E.) is determined to keep the scandal from the press, thus protecting his investment.
tagline: Five minutes ago, her lover called. He said something he should have told her before. Something she will have to live with for the rest of her life...Millions today are victims of Herpes. This story could be about your town. Your neighbors. Even somebody you love.
title: Intimate Agony
